txt.en: Your mission is to infiltrate the Ekhamâti camp, steal their torches, spill hog's blood, and eliminate their dôla all to spread the fear of the Blood Spectre.

'I have a task for you, [placeholder]. The Ordâkhai are a fearful people and many of them have heard a story since they were children of a blood-stained spectre who steals the life right from the Men of the south when they sleep. We believe you can be that spectre to them, to ignite their fears.\n\n'I ask that you travel to their camp to steal their torches and spill this hog's blood around to give the impression of the spectre. Then eliminate the dôla in the camp to spread the fear. You should try and avoid any guards while you are there to ensure the story will be believed, but do not hesitate to defeat any who happen to discover your presence.'
Your mission is to infiltrate the Ekhamâti camp, steal their torches, spill hog's blood, and eliminate their dôla all to spread the fear of the Blood Spectre.
'Welcome back, [placeholder]. That should stoke the fires and spread fear throughout their ranks. Take this as a token of gratitude for what you have accomplished this day.'
There is no twist in this mission.
Your mission is to infiltrate the Ekhamâti camp, steal their torches, spill hog's blood, and eliminate their dôla all to spread the fear of the Blood Spectre.
Your mission is to infiltrate the Ekhamâti camp, steal their torches, spill hog's blood, and eliminate their dôla all to spread the fear of the Blood Spectre.\n\nSpeak to Setokúli to travel.
